statements: DELETE FROM public.sentiment_analysis_data WHERE id = 10 AND username = 'user1';
DELETE FROM public.sentiment_analysis_data WHERE likes > 100 AND comments < 10;
DELETE FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score < 0.5 AND analysis_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM social_media_users WHERE user_location = 'New York' AND followers_count > 1000;
DELETE FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_label = 'positive' AND sentiment_score > 0.5
DELETE FROM public.sentiment_analysis WHERE post_id = 123 AND analysis_date = '2022-01-01';
